name: Shao
description:
Shao co-founded Perpetual Protocol (perp.com)—the first AMM-based on-chain perpetual exchange, launched in 2019, which has served over 500,000 users with tens of billions in trading volume. 

This year, he’s focused on Nekodex (under PERP), a mobile-first DEX that lowers entry barriers by abstracting blockchain complexities, making crypto accessible to a broader audience.
